title: How much does ‘Zee Music Company' charge to produce a song? - Quora

response.answer_text: Zee Music Company is a music publishing/marketing company in the first place. Secondly, they sign music producers to their label. Which means now those signed producers will make music for Zee. In the same way they have Singers signed for their label too, which means they will sing songs produced by music producer/lyricist/music director signed by the Zee label. In short, if you aren’t signed to the label why would they even produce song for you (Unless you’re ready to throw lakhs of money or you’re a big shot person)
